Translations.Text: geudeul ijeon-edo seonjijaga baegseongdeul-ege wass-eudoe geudeul ttohan geuneun ma sulsayo animyeon michinjala malhaessdeola
geudeul-i seolo-ege sangsoghan yu san-ilado doendan mal-inga sillo geudeul eun omanhan baegseongdeul-ila
geuleomeulo geudeul-eul meollihala geulihamyeon munchaegbadji anh-eul geos-ila
geuleona geudaeui mesejileul galeuchila midneun sindodeul-ege yuighanila
naega yeongmawa ingan-eul changjoham-eungeudeul-i naleul seomgige halyeo ham-ila
naega geudeul-ege il-yonghal yangsig eul guhaji anihamyeo ttohan naleul bu yanghagil balajido anhnola
sillo hananim-eun gwonneung-gwa him-ui junim-euloseo il-yonghal yangsig-eul bepuneun suyeojaisila
joejieun mulineun geudeul donglyoui muliwa yusahan beol-eul badnola geuleo meulo na-ege seodulleo guhaji anhdo log hala
geudeul-i yagsogbad-eun geunal-eul midji anihan jadeul-ege jaeang-i iss-eulila
ttuleu san-eulo maengsehasa
gilogdoen seongseolo maengsehamyeo
geugeos-eun pyeolchyeojin yangpijie gilog doen geos-ila
gyeongbaehagi wihae bangmun-i jaj-eun ka-euba sinjeon-eulo maengsehamyeo
nop-eun haneullo maengsehamyeo
manjoga doen badalo maengsehanani
geudae junim-ui beol-eun bandeusi nae lil geos-ila
eoneu nugudo geugeos-eul pihal su eobsnola
haneul-i jindonghaneun nal
geuligo sandeul-i hwinallineun nal
geunal-eul geoyeoghan jadeul-ege jae ang-i iss-eul geos-ila
geudeul-eun heowie molduhan jadeullo
geunal-e solichimyeo buljieug-eulo kkeullyeogani
igeos-i balo neohuiga geoyeoghaess deon buljiog-ila malhayeo jideola
